CVXPY
Minimize
  norm1(X)
Subject To
Bounds
 X free
End
----------------------------------------
AFTER COMPILATION
Minimize
 Obj: +1 x_0 +1 x_1 +1 x_2 +1 x_3
Subject to
 c1: -1 x_0 +1 x_4 <= +0
 c2: -1 x_1 +1 x_5 <= +0
 c3: -1 x_2 +1 x_6 <= +0
 c4: -1 x_3 +1 x_7 <= +0
 c5: -1 x_0 -1 x_4 <= +0
 c6: -1 x_1 -1 x_5 <= +0
 c7: -1 x_2 -1 x_6 <= +0
 c8: -1 x_3 -1 x_7 <= +0
Bounds
 x_0 free
 x_1 free
 x_2 free
 x_3 free
 x_4 free
 x_5 free
 x_6 free
 x_7 free
End
----------------------------------------
SCIP
Minimize
 Obj: +1 x5
Subject to
\   [nonlinear] <c1>: abs((<X_0_0>))+abs((<X_0_1>))+abs((<X_1_0>))+abs((<X_1_1>))+<x5>*(-1) <= 0;
Bounds
 X_0_0 free
 X_0_1 free
 X_1_0 free
 X_1_1 free
 x5 free
End
